channel.title: Need help with minigame
channel.description: im using reapagescape and i want to make a minigame i have put the npc's in the places i want them to be, the main problem is that how do i make it so that when i kill the first monster in the minigame i get teled to the next? please help me :(

item.title: Need help with minigame
item.dc:creator: @memorial memorial
item.description:
@memorial wrote:

hm i have no clue but i think reapagescape has a gsmini and remmember in the gsmini u kill the air elemental and it teleports u to the next spot why don’t u get the npc id of the air elemental and search it in maybe. client.java or npchandler

hope i helped =P
